org.zaproxy.zap.utils

Class ContentMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zaproxy.zap.utils.ContentMatcher

  • public class ContentMatcher
extends Object
    Support utility able to manage multiple string/regex occurrence searching inside a target content
    Author:
    yhawke 2013

      • getInstance

        public static ContentMatcher getInstance(String xmlFileName)
        Direct method for a complete ContentMatcher instance creation. Use the ClassLoader for the resource detection and loading, be careful regarding the relative file name use (this class is in another package).
        Parameters:
        xmlfileName - the name of the XML file that need to be used for initialization
        Returns:
        a ContentMatcher instance

        Parameters:

      • loadXMLPatternDefinitions

        protected void loadXMLPatternDefinitions(InputStream xmlInputStream)
                                  throws org.jdom.JDOMException,
                                         IOException
        Load a pattern list from an XML formatted file. Pattern should be enclosed around a tag and should be defined as . Use "regex" to define a Regex formatted pattern or "string" for an exact matching pattern.
        Throws:
        org.jdom.JDOMException
        IOException

      • findInContent

        public String findInContent(String content)
        Search for an occurrence inside a specific content
        Parameters:
        content - the string content to search into
        Returns:
        the found occurrence or null if no match has been done

      • findAllInContent

        public List<String> findAllInContent(String content)
        Search for all possible occurrences inside a specific content
        Parameters:
        content - the string content to search into
        Returns:
        a list of existing occurrences
